LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPER_Etch_Runecircle_G: Preferred to normal etch runecircles if both are available to cast. Will etch greater runecircles on a random cell in the Greater Runecircle Spot area.\nWill only target cells that don't already have any runecircle of any level.
LanguageData.BetterAutocastVPE.VPER_Etch_Runecircle.E: Will etch runecircles on a random cell in the Runecircle Spot area.\nWill only target cells that don't already have any runecircle of any level.
